lottery.title: Chance to win extra prints!
lottery.hint: Each time you make a new order, our lottery system checks whether you can get two other prints for free

interval.title: Waiting whole hour to check whether lottery works as expected can be... dramatically boring. With the help of these switches we can reduce waiting time:
interval.order: Ain't nobody got time for that (once per order)

reverse.all: Who doesn't like good old string reverse?
reverse.words: Or only words order? Hold my lemonade

photo-booth-page.title: Photo booth
photo-booth-page.subtitle: Use actions to toggle mirror mode and input field to add text on image
photo-booth-page.no-permission: Please, give permission for video capturing

product-page.title: Make an order
product-page.subtitle: Select format which suits you the best
product-page.win: Congrats! You have won extra prints
product-page.payment-error: Something went wrong, try again later
product-page.warning-lose-prize: You have won free items. Clearing the cart will also remove prize, and who knows when you are lucky again...
